instruction: List all VMs sorted by memory allocation

output.action: VBoxManage list vms | while read vm; do VBoxManage showvminfo "$vm" --machinereadable | grep memory=; done | sort -t= -k2 -n
output.result: VMs sorted: Test-VM 1GB, Dev-VM 4GB, DB-VM 8GB, Build-VM 16GB
